title: The Chronicles of Ahmayzzia
description: The ten-part epic story of Will Nobody, the ordinary eight-year-old boy who falls through his toy chest into the land of Ahmayzzia, where he discovers he is the Prince of Light, destined to save Ahmayzzia from Pordrog, Lord of Darkness.
quote: His fingers are eight-fold, his ears are the same. He’s born of two parents, Nobody’s his name.
altHero: Will holding a staff with Endengorn, the elf, and a llama
alt3: Will uses the staff to shoot light at a dragon
alt4: Will, Endengorn, and the llama face off with Pordrog’s floating eye
